0000011011001111 0111000111101011 0 -> sum: 0111100010111010, cout: 0
1101010101111000 1100001101010001 0 -> sum: 1001100011001001, cout: 1

0000011000011101 0100001011101001 0 -> sum: 0100100100000110, cout: 0
0100101110011010 1011101011001001 0 -> sum: 0000011001100011, cout: 1
